item.title: About me
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: My name is Inigo Montoya. I have the following qualities: I rock a great mustache I’m extremely loyal to my family What else do you need? my history To be honest, I’m having some trouble remembering right now, so why don’t you just watch my movie and it will answer all your questions.

item.title: Introducing eemR
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: The eemR package implements various functions used calculate metrics from excitation-emission matrix (EEM) as well as to preform pre-processing corrections before PARAFAC analysis. All functions from this package start with the eem_ prefix. Please note this is a very alpha version of the package for testing purpose only. library(eemR) ls("package:eemR") ## [1] "absorbance" "eem_bind" ## [3] "eem_biological_index" "eem_coble_peaks" ## [5] "eem_cut" "eem_export_matlab" ## [7] "eem_extract" "eem_fluorescence_index" ## [9] "eem_humification_index" "eem_inner_filter_effect" ## [11] "eem_names" "eem_names<-" ## [13] "eem_peaks" "eem_raman_normalisation" ## [15] "eem_read" "eem_remove_blank" ## [17] "eem_remove_scattering" "eem_set_wavelengths" The package can be installed using the following command.
